verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and to \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, When \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* hath a running \w issue|strong="H2100"\w* out of his \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, \add because of\add* his \w issue|strong="H2101"\w* he \add is\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*.\f + \fr 15.2 \ft running…: or, running of the reins\f*

And this shall be his \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w* in his \w issue|strong="H2101"\w*: whether his \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w run|strong="H7325"\w* with his \w issue|strong="H2101"\w*, or his \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* be \w stopped|strong="H2856"\w* from his \w issue|strong="H2101"\w*, it \add is\add* his \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w*.

Every \w bed|strong="H4904"\w*, whereon he \w lieth|strong="H7901"\w* that hath the \w issue|strong="H2100"\w*, is \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*: and every \w thing|strong="H3627"\w*, whereon he \w sitteth|strong="H3427"\w*, shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*.\f + \fr 15.4 \ft thing: Heb. vessel\f*

And \w whosoever|strong="H0376"\w* \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* his \w bed|strong="H4904"\w* shall \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w bathe|strong="H7364"\w* \add himself\add* in \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until the \w even|strong="H6153"\w*.

And he that \w sitteth|strong="H3427"\w* on \add any\add* \w thing|strong="H3627"\w* whereon he \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* that hath the \w issue|strong="H2100"\w* shall \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w bathe|strong="H7364"\w* \add himself\add* in \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until the \w even|strong="H6153"\w*.

And he that \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* of him that hath the \w issue|strong="H2100"\w* shall \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w bathe|strong="H7364"\w* \add himself\add* in \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until the \w even|strong="H6153"\w*.

And if he that hath the \w issue|strong="H2100"\w* \w spit|strong="H7556"\w* upon him that is \w clean|strong="H2889"\w*; then he shall \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w bathe|strong="H7364"\w* \add himself\add* in \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until the \w even|strong="H6153"\w*.
And what \w saddle|strong="H4817"\w* soever he \w rideth|strong="H7392"\w* upon that hath the \w issue|strong="H2100"\w* shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*.

And whosoever \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* any thing that was under him shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until the \w even|strong="H6153"\w*: and he that \w beareth|strong="H5375"\w* \add any of\add* those things shall \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w bathe|strong="H7364"\w* \add himself\add* in \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until the \w even|strong="H6153"\w*.

And whomsoever he \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* that hath the \w issue|strong="H2100"\w*, and hath not \w rinsed|strong="H7857"\w* his \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* in \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, he shall \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w bathe|strong="H7364"\w* \add himself\add* in \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until the \w even|strong="H6153"\w*.

And the \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w* of \w earth|strong="H2789"\w*, that he \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* which hath the \w issue|strong="H2100"\w*, shall be \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*: and every \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w* of \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* shall be \w rinsed|strong="H7857"\w* in \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

And when he that hath an \w issue|strong="H2100"\w* is \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w* of his \w issue|strong="H2101"\w*; then he shall \w number|strong="H5608"\w* to himself \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* for his \w cleansing|strong="H2893"\w*, and \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w bathe|strong="H7364"\w* his \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* in \w running|strong="H2416"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and shall be \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*.

And on the \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* he shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* to him \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w turtledoves|strong="H8449"\w*, or \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w pigeons|strong="H3123"\w*, and \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, and \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them unto the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*:

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* them, the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \add for\add* a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, and the \w other|strong="H0259"\w* \add for\add* a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*; and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for him \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* for his \w issue|strong="H2101"\w*.

And if any \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of \w copulation|strong="H7902"\w* go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from him, then he shall \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* all his \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* in \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until the \w even|strong="H6153"\w*.

And every \w garment|strong="H0899"\w*, and every \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, whereon is the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of \w copulation|strong="H7902"\w*, shall be \w washed|strong="H3526"\w* with \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until the \w even|strong="H6153"\w*.

The \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* also with whom \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* \add with\add* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of \w copulation|strong="H7902"\w*, they shall \add both\add* \w bathe|strong="H7364"\w* \add themselves\add* in \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until the \w even|strong="H6153"\w*.

¶ And if a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* have an \w issue|strong="H2100"\w*, \add and\add* her \w issue|strong="H2101"\w* in her \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* be \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, she shall be put \w apart|strong="H5079"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*: and whosoever \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* her shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until the \w even|strong="H6153"\w*.\f + \fr 15.19 \ft put…: Heb. in her separation\f*

And every thing that she \w lieth|strong="H7901"\w* upon in her \w separation|strong="H5079"\w* shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*: every thing also that she \w sitteth|strong="H3427"\w* upon shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*.

And whosoever \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* her \w bed|strong="H4904"\w* shall \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w bathe|strong="H7364"\w* \add himself\add* in \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until the \w even|strong="H6153"\w*.

And whosoever \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* any \w thing|strong="H3627"\w* that she \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* upon shall \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w bathe|strong="H7364"\w* \add himself\add* in \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until the \w even|strong="H6153"\w*.

And if it \add be\add* on \add her\add* \w bed|strong="H4904"\w*, or on any \w thing|strong="H3627"\w* whereon she \w sitteth|strong="H3427"\w*, when he \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* it, he shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until the \w even|strong="H6153"\w*.

And if any \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* with her at \w all|strong="H7901"\w*, and her \w flowers|strong="H5079"\w* be upon him, he shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*; and all the \w bed|strong="H4904"\w* whereon he \w lieth|strong="H7901"\w* shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*.

And if a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w have|strong="H2100"\w* an \w issue|strong="H2101"\w* of her \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w out|strong="H3808"\w* of the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of her \w separation|strong="H5079"\w*, or if it \w run|strong="H2100"\w* beyond the \w time|strong="H5921"\w* of her \w separation|strong="H5079"\w*; all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w issue|strong="H2101"\w* of her \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w* shall be as the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of her \w separation|strong="H5079"\w*: she \add shall be\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*.

Every \w bed|strong="H4904"\w* whereon she \w lieth|strong="H7901"\w* all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of her \w issue|strong="H2101"\w* shall be unto her as the \w bed|strong="H4904"\w* of her \w separation|strong="H5079"\w*: and \w whatsoever|strong="H3627"\w* she \w sitteth|strong="H3427"\w* upon shall be \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*, as the \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w* of her \w separation|strong="H5079"\w*.

And whosoever \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* those things shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*, and shall \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w bathe|strong="H7364"\w* \add himself\add* in \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until the \w even|strong="H6153"\w*.

But if she be \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w* of her \w issue|strong="H2101"\w*, then she shall \w number|strong="H5608"\w* to herself \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, and \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that she shall be \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*.

And on the \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* she shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* unto her \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w turtles|strong="H8449"\w*, or \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w pigeons|strong="H3123"\w*, and \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* them unto the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, to the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*.

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \add for\add* a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, and the \w other|strong="H0259"\w* \add for\add* a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*; and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for her \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* for the \w issue|strong="H2101"\w* of her \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w*.

Thus shall ye \w separate|strong="H5144"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* from their \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w*; that they \w die|strong="H4191"\w* not in their \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w*, when they \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* my \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* that \add is\add* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* them.

This \add is\add* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of him that hath an \w issue|strong="H2100"\w*, and \add of him\add* whose \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w goeth|strong="H3318"\w* from him, and is \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* therewith;

And of her that is \w sick|strong="H1739"\w* of her \w flowers|strong="H5079"\w*, and of him that \w hath|strong="H2100"\w* an \w issue|strong="H2101"\w*, of the \w man|strong="H2145"\w*, and of the \w woman|strong="H5347"\w*, and of \w him|strong="H0376"\w* that \w lieth|strong="H7901"\w* with her that is \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*.
